step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on the backward and downward motion.
Nice roll! Try to bring your shoulder blades closer together as you roll them back and down.
Great job on the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Second set, looking good. Ensure the motion is smooth and controlled, not rushed.
Excellent! Focus on the downward part of the roll to complete the circular motion.
Fantastic finish! You're doing a great job regaining shoulder mobility. Keep up the good work.

exercise_summary: You've completed the Shoulder Rolls exercise well! Remember to keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth, circular motion. Breathing deeply during the backward movement helps improve oxygen flow. Keep practicing to enhance shoulder mobility.
